argSrc: Germany should by no means introduce capital punishment.
argTrg: If there were capital punishment, this would mean people are allowed to put themselves above others and rule over their lives.

argSrc: Germany should by no means introduce capital punishment.
argTrg: Capital punishment would be murder and would have to be punished with the death penalty itself.
